languages.text: "Тобой может двигать воля к борьбе, но знай — Кьява Гамма уже обращена. Ее линии перестроены, ее слуги уже вкусили плоды прогресса. В котлах мануфакторума плавятся металлы, из которых скуют вместилища священных духов, а адепты без устали постигают все новые и новые тайны, прежде скрытые лживыми заветами. Вы, слуги фальшивых богов, опоздали — вся мощь этого мира вскорости обратится против Анафемы и его рабов".

"You may be driven by your will to fight, but know this — Kiava Gamma has already been converted. Its lines have been restructured, and its servants have already tasted the fruits of progress. In the crucibles of this manufactorum, torrid liquid metals will be used to forge vessels for sacred spirits. The adepts are already tirelessly delving deeper into new mysteries that were once barred by false tenets. You, servants of fake gods, are too late — the entire might of this world will soon rise up against the Anathema and his slaves."
languages.original_text: "Тобой может двигать воля к борьбе, но знай — Кьява Гамма уже обращена. Ее линии перестроены, ее слуги уже вкусили плоды прогресса. В котлах мануфакторума плавятся металлы, из которых скуют вместилища священных духов, а адепты без устали постигают все новые и новые тайны, прежде скрытые лживыми заветами. Вы, слуги фальшивых богов, опоздали — вся мощь этого мира вскорости обратится против Анафемы и его рабов".

traits.locale_text: "You may be driven by your will to fight, but know this — Kiava Gamma has already been converted. Its lines have been restructured, its servants have already tasted the fruits of progress. In the crucibles of this manufactorum, metals are melting, which will be used to forge vessels for sacred spirits from the warp, and the adepts are tirelessly delving deeper into new mysteries that were once barred by false tenets. You, servants of fake gods, are too late — the entire might of this world will soon rise up against the Anathema and his slaves."

"You may be driven by your will to fight, but know this — Kiava Gamma has already been converted. Its lines have been restructured, its servants have already tasted the fruits of progress. You, servants of fake gods, are too late — the entire might of this world will soon rise up against the Anathema and his slaves."

languages.text: “你或许正在被战斗的意志所驱使，但你要知道，基亚瓦伽马星已经得到了改造。它的线路已经得到了重组，它的仆人也已经尝到了进步的果实。在这制造工厂的熔炉里，炽热的液体金属被用来铸造容纳神圣精神的容器，而技术神甫们也在不知疲倦地深入研究那些曾被虚假信条所阻碍的神秘知识。至于你们，伪神的仆人，你们来得太迟了。用不了多久，这个世界的全部力量都会团结起来，反对伪神与他的奴隶们。”
languages.original_text: "You may be driven by your will to fight, but know this — Kiava Gamma has already been converted. Its lines have been restructured, and its servants have already tasted the fruits of progress. In the crucibles of this manufactorum, torrid liquid metals will be used to forge vessels for sacred spirits. The adepts are already tirelessly delving deeper into new mysteries that were once barred by false tenets. You, servants of fake gods, are too late — the entire might of this world will soon rise up against the Anathema and his slaves."

traits.locale_text: “你或许正在被战斗的意志所驱使，但你要知道，基亚瓦伽马星已经得到了改造。它的线路已经得到了重组，它的仆人也已经尝到了进步的果实。在这制造工厂的熔炉里，炽热的液体金属被用来铸造容纳神圣精神的容器，而技术祭司们也在不知疲倦地深入研究那些曾被虚假信条所阻碍的神秘知识。至于你们，伪神的仆人，你们来得太迟了。用不了多久，这个世界的全部力量都会团结起来，反对伪神与他的奴隶们。”

languages.text: «Tal vez les impulse la voluntad de luchar, pero deben saber esto: la conversión de Kiava Gamma es completa. Sus líneas de producción ya se han reestructurado y sus sirvientes ya han degustado las mieles del progreso. En los crisoles de este manufactorum, metales líquidos abrasadores forman receptáculos para espíritus sagrados. Los adeptos ya estudian misterios cada vez más profundos que antes les estaban vedados por falsos mandamientos. Los siervos de falsos dioses llegan tarde: el poder de todo este mundo pronto se alzará contra el Anatema y sus esclavos».
languages.original_text: "You may be driven by your will to fight, but know this — Kiava Gamma has already been converted. Its lines have been restructured, and its servants have already tasted the fruits of progress. In the crucibles of this manufactorum, torrid liquid metals will be used to forge vessels for sacred spirits. The adepts are already tirelessly delving deeper into new mysteries that were once barred by false tenets. You, servants of fake gods, are too late — the entire might of this world will soon rise up against the Anathema and his slaves."

Sus líneas de producción ya se han reestructurado y sus sirvientes ya han degustado las mieles del progreso. En los crisoles de este manufactorum, metales líquidos abrasadores forman receptáculos para espíritus sagrados. Los adeptos ya estudian misterios cada vez más profundos que antes les estaban vedados por falsos mandamientos. Los siervos de falsos dioses llegan tarde: el poder de todo este mundo pronto se alzará contra el Anatema y sus esclavos».

languages.text: 「戦闘意欲に突き動かされてるかもしれないが、覚えておけ。キアヴァ・ガンマはすでに変換されている。ラインは再構築され、従者達はすでに進歩の果実を味わっているのだ。この聖工場の坩堝では、聖霊の器を鍛造するために灼熱の金属液が使われている。実力者達はすでに、かつて偽りの教義によって禁じられていた新たな謎を精力的に深く掘り下げていたのだ。偽の神の使いであるお前達はもう遅かった。この惑星の全勢力がすぐに大敵とその奴隷に対して立ち上がるだろう」
languages.original_text: "You may be driven by your will to fight, but know this — Kiava Gamma has already been converted. Its lines have been restructured, and its servants have already tasted the fruits of progress. In the crucibles of this manufactorum, torrid liquid metals will be used to forge vessels for sacred spirits. The adepts are already tirelessly delving deeper into new mysteries that were once barred by false tenets. You, servants of fake gods, are too late — the entire might of this world will soon rise up against the Anathema and his slaves."

traits.locale_text: 「戦闘意欲に突き動かされてるかもしれないが、覚えておけ。キアヴァ・ガンマはすでに変換されている。ラインは再構築され、従者達はすでに進歩の果実を味わっているのだ。この聖工場の坩堝では、聖霊の器を鍛造するために灼熱の金属液が使われている。実力者達はすでに、かつて偽りの教義によって禁じられていた新たな謎を精力的に深く掘り下げていたのだ。偽の神の使いであるお前達はもう遅かった。この惑星の全勢力がすぐに大敵とその奴隷に対して立ち上がるだろう」

languages.text: "Euer Kampfeswille mag Euch antreiben, aber wisset: Kiava Gamma wurde bereits konvertiert. Der Betrieb wurde umstrukturiert, und seine Diener haben die Früchte des Fortschritts bereits geschmeckt. In den Eingeweiden dieses Manufactorums schmieden glühende Flüssigmetalle Gefäße für heilige Geister. Die Adepten dringen bereits unermüdlich zu neuen Geheimnissen vor, die einst von falschen Lehren verbarrikadiert wurden. Ihr Diener falscher Götter kommt zu spät – die gesamte Macht dieser Welt wird schon bald gegen das Anathema und seine Sklaven aufbegehren."
languages.original_text: "You may be driven by your will to fight, but know this — Kiava Gamma has already been converted. Its lines have been restructured, and its servants have already tasted the fruits of progress. In the crucibles of this manufactorum, torrid liquid metals will be used to forge vessels for sacred spirits. The adepts are already tirelessly delving deeper into new mysteries that were once barred by false tenets. You, servants of fake gods, are too late — the entire might of this world will soon rise up against the Anathema and his slaves."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Kampfeswille mag Euch antreiben, aber wisset: Kiava Gamma wurde bereits konvertiert. Der Betrieb wurde umstrukturiert, und seine Diener haben die Früchte des Fortschritts bereits geschmeckt. In den Eingeweiden dieses Manufactorums schmieden glühende Flüssigmetalle Gefäße für heilige Geister. Die Adepten dringen bereits unermüdlich zu neuen Geheimnissen vor, die einst von falschen Lehren verbarrikadiert wurden. Ihr Diener falscher Götter kommt zu spät – die gesamte Macht dieser Welt wird schon bald gegen das Anathema und seine Sklaven aufbegehren."

languages.text: « Malgré l'envie de vous battre qui vous anime, sachez que Kiava Gamma est déjà convertie. Ses lignes ont été réorganisées et ses serviteurs ont goûté aux fruits du progrès. Des métaux en fusion jailliront bientôt des hauts-fourneaux de ce manufactorum pour forger les réceptacles d'esprits sacrés. Les adeptes approfondissent déjà inlassablement de nouveaux mystères qui étaient autrefois interdits par les faux préceptes. Vous autres, serviteurs des faux dieux, vous arrivez trop tard. Toute la puissance de ce monde sera bientôt dirigée contre l'Anathème et ses esclaves. »
languages.original_text: "You may be driven by your will to fight, but know this — Kiava Gamma has already been converted. Its lines have been restructured, and its servants have already tasted the fruits of progress. In the crucibles of this manufactorum, torrid liquid metals will be used to forge vessels for sacred spirits. The adepts are already tirelessly delving deeper into new mysteries that were once barred by false tenets. You, servants of fake gods, are too late — the entire might of this world will soon rise up against the Anathema and his slaves."

traits.locale_text: « Malgré l'envie de vous battre qui vous anime, sachez que Kiava Gamma est déjà convertie. Ses lignes ont été réorganisées et ses serviteurs ont goûté aux fruits du progrès. Des métaux en fusion jailliront bientôt des hauts-fourneaux de ce manufactorum pour forger les réceptacles d'esprits sacrés. Les adeptes approfondissent déjà inlassablement de nouveaux mystères qui étaient autrefois interdits par les faux préceptes. Vous autres, serviteurs des faux dieux, vous arrivez trop tard. Toute la puissance de ce monde sera bientôt dirigée contre l'Anathème et ses esclaves. »

languages.text: "Savaşma isteğin ağır basıyor olabilir. Bil ki Kiava Gama çoktan dönüştü. Hatları yeniden yapılandırıldı ve hizmetkârları ilerlemenin meyvelerini çoktan tattı. Bu manufaktorumun potalarında, kutsal ruhlara mahfazalar üretmek için kavurucu sıvı metaller kullanılacak. Ustalar, bir zamanlar sahte ilkelerle engellenen yeni gizemleri yorulmadan, derinlemesine araştırmaya başladı. Sahte tanrıların hizmetkârı olan sizler çok geç kaldınız. Bu dünyanın tüm gücü, yakında menfur varlık ile kölelerine karşı ayaklanacak."
languages.original_text: "You may be driven by your will to fight, but know this — Kiava Gamma has already been converted. Its lines have been restructured, and its servants have already tasted the fruits of progress. In the crucibles of this manufactorum, torrid liquid metals will be used to forge vessels for sacred spirits. The adepts are already tirelessly delving deeper into new mysteries that were once barred by false tenets. You, servants of fake gods, are too late — the entire might of this world will soon rise up against the Anathema and his slaves."

traits.locale_text: "Savaşma isteğin ağır basıyor olabilir ama bil ki Kiava Gama çoktan dönüştü. Hatları yeniden yapılandırıldı ve hizmetkârları ilerlemenin meyvelerini çoktan tattı. Bu manufaktorumun potalarında, kutsal ruhlara mahfazalar üretmek için kavurucu sıvı metaller kullanılacak. Ustalar, bir zamanlar sahte ilkelerle engellenen yeni gizemleri yorulmadan derinlemesine araştırmaya başladı bile. Sahte tanrıların hizmetkârları sizler çok geç kaldınız, bu dünyanın tüm gücü yakında menfur varlık ile kölelerine karşı ayaklanacak."
